title: How to Make up a Double Bed

steps.headline: Straighten the bed skirt.
steps.description: Make sure it is hanging nicely on all sides.

steps.headline: Put the fitted sheet on the bed.
steps.description: Start with the two corners on the side by you. Then do the two corners on the far side. Come back to the first side and tighten down those two corners; do the same on the other side.

steps.headline: Put the flat sheet on the bed with the good side down.
steps.description: Tuck this under the mattress on all sides. Like you did with the fitted sheet, do each side twice to make sure it is tightly tucked under.

steps.headline: Lift up the end of the sheet by the headboard and set the pillows flat on the bed there.
steps.description: Lay the flat sheet over the pillows again.

steps.headline: Put the comforter on the bed.
steps.description: Check to be sure it is on straight so that the same amount of comforter is hanging off the bed on all sides.

steps.headline: Pull back the end of the comforter at the end by the headboard about a foot.
steps.description: Flatten this out so it lays smoothly against the top of the comforter/bed.

steps.headline: Do the same thing with the sheet.
steps.description: The "good side" should be showing when you do this. Once again, make sure it is laying smoothly against the top of the bed on the extra comforter you pulled down.

steps.headline: Set up any throw pillows on the upper part of the bed exposed by pulling back the comforter and sheet.

text: Straighten the bed skirt. Make sure it is hanging nicely on all sides. Put the fitted sheet on the bed. Start with the two corners on the side by you. Then do the two corners on the far side. Come back to the first side and tighten down those two corners; do the same on the other side. Put the flat sheet on the bed with the good side down. Tuck this under the mattress on all sides. Like you did with the fitted sheet, do each side twice to make sure it is tightly tucked under. Lift up the end of the sheet by the headboard and set the pillows flat on the bed there. Lay the flat sheet over the pillows again. Put the comforter on the bed. Check to be sure it is on straight so that the same amount of comforter is hanging off the bed on all sides. Pull back the end of the comforter at the end by the headboard about a foot. Flatten this out so it lays smoothly against the top of the comforter/bed. Do the same thing with the sheet. The "good side" should be showing when you do this. Once again, make sure it is laying smoothly against the top of the bed on the extra comforter you pulled down. Set up any throw pillows on the upper part of the bed exposed by pulling back the comforter and sheet.  Finished.
